lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: it changes lives.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who don't have as many chances as I do.
lender.occupational_info: Inventors send their inventions to the Patent Office in Washington DC. The examiners look at the inventions very carefully. When it looks like the invention works and no-one else has done it before, then we give the inventor a Patent for his invention. That means that he is the only person who can sell his invention.

lender.name: windyCityScope
lender.loan_because: If Kiva didn't exist, I intended to launch one myself.
lender.occupational_info: Capital Markets

lender.name: Megan and Thomas
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing way to give someone the assistance they need while they are able to retain their dignity. I think Kiva is wonderful!
lender.occupational_info: I will just say that I am grateful to be employed.

lender.name: Seana
lender.loan_because: ... I can. Everyone deserves the chance to make their lives better. It was pure luck that I was born in a rich country where $25 doesnâ€™t seem that much to me, but it could mean the world to someone else. Share the abundance when you have it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to help make a difference, one person at a time.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Warthogg
lender.loan_because: I'm a firm believer that co-development and microcredit are pragmatic and efficient solutions to reduce poverty.

lender.name: Aziz
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to pursue their dream of achieving financial independence
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to meet their IT needs

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because:
I want to feel connected to the developing world. I look forward to seeing these small business thrive and creating economic independence.
~This is not charity. This is business: business with a social objective, which is to help people get out of poverty.~ -Muhammad Yunus, author of "Banker to the Poor"
lender.occupational_info: I work within the business development and planning team in a hospital. I help develop strategic growth plans for the hospital's services, such as within oncology, and do competitor research.

lender.name: Lane
lender.loan_because: By American standards, I am not a wealthy person. By world standards, I have plenty of money. To me the idea of microfinance is so incredibly beautiful and practical at the same time. I find it absolutely inspirational that an ordinary person like me can perhaps make an extraordinary difference in the quality of someone's life by loaning them a little money for a little while.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of other people's money by paying their bills and billing their customers. And I assist in borrowing money to help them grow their business. So, I know the great benefit of being able to borrow money, and I know how successful and proud one feels when that borrowed money is paid back.

lender.name: Amy & Doug
lender.loan_because: I am impressed with the drive and determination in the stories I have read. I can't wait to loan again soon
lender.occupational_info: Staying home with my daughter is such a blessing. I do work part-time as a baker, making cookies, pies etc. for a local bakery.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I am eager to help women help hemselves.
lender.occupational_info: My life's work has been encouraging and enabling women to rise to their highest potential in an academic setting. It is astonishing and most gratifying to see what happens when one sets expectations high and provides tools and encouragement.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites.

lender.name: ellen
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for.
lender.occupational_info: I teach first grade in Bethesda Maryland.

lender.name: LaVonne
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to help others help themselves

lender.name: Ian Lawlor
lender.loan_because: My nephew and partner introduced me to this www page with a Christmas gift 2007 and I want to pass on these good wishes to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant archaeologist working with Maori Iwi (tribes) and Tangatawhenua promoting partnerships with NZ government agencies and stakeholders.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: There are children and families who go to bed hungry and don't have the opportunities or blessings that we have in the U.S.A. which so many people here take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired now, and volunteer my time at the local VFW, Viet Nam Veterans, as well as several environmental organizations

lender.name: Marijke
lender.loan_because: I am so very lucky and blessed in my life. When I started my business I had people that believed in me and gave me a chance. I believe we can make this a better world by helping one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I own a preschool for children ages 6 weeks to 5 years old.

lender.name: Brenna
lender.loan_because: It's giving someone the chance and opportunity to help themselves, which I believe is the best kind of help you can give.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.occupation: Exec. Director of environmental education non-prof

lender.name: Rex and Irene Lawlor
lender.loan_because: Our nephew and partner gave us a Christmas (2007) gift and we want to keep on giving this good cheer.
lender.occupational_info: Home gardening and craft work.

lender.name: Marci
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to reach their full potential.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: Reaching out to someone and giving them a helping hand to help themselves and their families is something that brings this world closer together. Sometimes all you need is someone to believe in you and a little support--and you can change your life!
lender.occupational_info: Own a management company with my husband-we manage apartments and small retail centers as well as developing other real estate projects

lender.name: Joe & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need start up capital. I want to help people that have the drive to make a better life for them self's. I also want to give some thing back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm self employed Domino's Pizza Franchisee...

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Lending through Kiva seems like a direct way to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who helps those who are accused of a crime, and who cannot afford to pay for a lawyer.

lender.name: Cub Scout Pack 171
lender.loan_because: To get our Cub Scout pack involved in helping others at an early age.

lender.name: A_I
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a post-grad student studying International Project Management. I hope to one day work in the field of International Development.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity and gifts that have been given to me in my life and want to give back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I put people off to sleep for surgery.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay-at-home mother of 1 very active 2 year old. In addition, I work from home part-time doing Independent Contracting.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I lived in Jamaica for two years and I saw how a a small amount of money can make big changes in the lives of people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Create a variety of multimedia marketing campaigns and thought leadership programs for the private and public sectors.

lender.name: Drichelle, Rob & Dax
lender.occupation: Rob - Teacher. Drichelle - bookkeeper Dax - 2 yrs

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: somebody should.

lender.name: Cathe
lender.loan_because: As Dr. Muhammad Yunus, a Nobel Prize winner, notes "being poor should not be a barrier to being able to take out a loan to buy your way out of poverty." This is the ultimate in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work with homeless single mothers who are changing their lives and the lives of their children by earning college degrees to provide them with career-track employment. We empower families through education.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: my friends and I decided to give to others instead of exchanging Christmas presents...
lender.occupational_info: I work with students who have disabilities.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think free money is great!

lender.name: jen
lender.loan_because: i believe in people's courage.
lender.occupational_info: mommy

lender.name: Joseph Mastey
lender.loan_because: Nobody gets by without the help of others. I want to pass on some of the kindness that others have shown to me.

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: I like joining with many others to help industrious people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Now I work on clay creations which can be seen at: goodearthclaydesigns.shutterfly.com

lender.loan_because: "...not for yourself, but for the whole world were you born"

lender.name: Audrey
lender.occupation: Elected County Official and Early Learning Spclist
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help in a permanent and sustaining way! And it breaks up a busy local day with an international impact!
lender.occupational_info: I represent local residents in issues, esp how tax dollars are spent. In my other job I help infants and children under age 3 who have disabilities. Teach parents how to help the children, do therapy, learn new skills.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I saw the "Water Buffalo" short film and it touched my heart. http://www.jazzviolin.com/china/water-buffalo-movie/ I wanted to do something to help the world in my own small way and was directed to this website.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alicyn
lender.loan_because: I care about other people.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: a great person introduced me to this site...and I want to help with whatever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who struggle in school to help them succeed.

lender.name: Maximiliano
lender.loan_because: it helps other people improve their lives

lender.name: JD Smith
lender.loan_because: I didn't get started by myself either. What goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.occupational_info: My wife is a professor at a local university. For 22 years my job has been to support her career. I fill the roles of; Chef, Maid, Repairman, Accountant, Driver and more.

lender.name: Area Family
lender.loan_because: waarom? daarom.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: It is important for me to help women across the globe. I also want to encourage my children and family members to support others around the globe as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychologist focusing on Leadership Development, Coaching Women in the Workplace, Work/Life Balance and Team Building.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I heard about this program from my dad who read about it in the newspaper. It sounded like such a great idea and a way to help someone through supporting their business. I am really excited to be a new member!
lender.occupational_info: I work as an occupational therapist in a senior center and to home visits for an elderly low-income population. Our members qualify for nursing home level of care and can remain safely in the community with the help of my organization.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have success and want to help others achieve their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office where the associates help people recover from auto accidents through finance

lender.name: Vintage Fashion Library
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people with their sewing skills.
lender.occupational_info: I sell sewing patterns in two stores online.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I want to change my world by giving others the tools to change their world!
lender.occupational_info: I take raw undeveloped land and prepare it for housing development.

lender.name: Mathew
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info:
I work for a small advertising and marketing firm in Minneapolis, Minnesota. While at work I write computer code for various websites that works behind the scenes.
Essentially, I help to make the internet work the way it does. Click and you go? I work on the 'you go' part!

lender.name: Ritchie
lender.loan_because: I have many blessings in my life most of which can be traced back to the support of a loving family and good friends. It is easy to succeed when you can count on help when it is needed. I hope that I am able to help someone in some small way as a way to say thanks for all the help that I have received along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I am happily Married with two children youngest is in grade 12. I am an aircraft mechanic, an occupation that has kept me employed for the last 23 years. It is a job that I find both challenging and interesting.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because:
People take chances on me every day!
25$ is round of drinks for my friends and I on any given night but a means to a wonderful end for some amazing people!

lender.name: Michael & Julie
lender.loan_because: "Faith is being sure of what we hope for and certain of what we do not see." Hebrews 11:1. We're so thankful for God's promises, provisions and care. We want to share His love with others. ~ Each day growing by faith to love & serve!

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do.

lender.name: Agnieszka
lender.loan_because: I care & I can

lender.name: Paul & Jill
lender.loan_because: It's important to help. We're all in this together. Loans made in memory of Charles Kellner
lender.occupational_info: I work in music - media - on both the creative and finance side. My wife works in HR

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I have had the privilege to visit developing countries such as Ghana and Togo, and I want to help the people there.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: Helping others in the time of need is something that comes naturally to me. And showing my daughter that helping others is very important in life. Alicyn is my lovely, beautiful daugther!
lender.occupational_info: Helping surgeons and patients in the operating room during surgical cases.

lender.name: Jacques
lender.loan_because:
I was always taught to "leave it better than you found it". It in this case is the world. I am not rich in money, but I have enough to cover my essentials. Now it is time to help others to the extent that I can.
I am especially interested in loans going to Haiti because i have visited there 3 times and understand first hand the depth of need in that country.
lender.occupational_info: I help others find houses to live in or buildings to turn into businesses.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: everyone at least deserves an opportunity.

lender.name: Tamar
lender.loan_because: I believe the world would be a better place if we all help each other make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I provide general medical care to low income teenagers. In addition, I run a reproductive health clinic in the schools; providing family planning education, starting girls on birth control methods, and testing and treating teens for sexually transmitted diseases.

lender.name: The Women's House
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students living together in the Women's House at Ohio Wesleyan University.

lender.name: EdV
lender.loan_because: I understand what a big difference a little thing can make.
lender.occupational_info:
Making electrical power generation systems from 100 Watts to 2 Mega Watts reliable and affordable to a wide range of customers.
I also teach music.

lender.name: Sample Family
lender.loan_because: Our family has been very blessed and we would love to pass on our blessing to others.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: My grand father was a great doctor who always treated his patients regardless of their financial ability. It is the rigt action for me to share the gift he left us to people in need.

lender.name: JMO
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to give back. I've been blessed with a good job and it's only fair that someone else get the same chance as me.
lender.occupational_info: I talk on the radio and send technicians to homes to fix plumbing and air-conditioning and heating problems.

lender.name: TLC family
lender.loan_because: We want to help!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Administrator, My fiance is a 7th grade teacher

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help the poor
lender.occupational_info: My work is very interesting,I get to meet people from all over the world and hear about their different cultures and lifestyles.

lender.name: Carole Jo

lender.occupational_info: I work behind the scenes in professional theatre ~ coordinating actors, technicians, musicians, designers.....I pull it all together!

lender.name: Isa & Twyla
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have others help me with my business and I know what a an fantastic difference that makes!
lender.occupational_info: I own a hair salon where we cut, color and style hair. We like to help people feel good about themselves. I also manufacture hair color products.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to be born in Canada. I hope to help someone else who's starting out with much less than I ever had.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build stuff.

lender.name: deborah
lender.loan_because: you make my life worth living you make we want to start giving more and more away to you it's not mine anyway

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: KIVA is one small way in which we can truly make a difference.

lender.name: Vinnie
lender.loan_because: I loan because Kiva has made it possible to connect to our global community. I want to make a difference in individuals lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am happy and healthy with a satisfying job that provide me with financial stability.

lender.name: Mona
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: elize
lender.loan_because: I am thankful that I can give back, whether I loan money to Kiva or donate my time to other organizations, it's not only fulfilling, it's a very humbling experience.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteering is a gratifying feeling, everyone of us has time to donate or give back in some way. It makes everyone involved better people.

lender.name: Angella
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: corporate lackey - for now...

lender.name: Joanne

lender.name: Carl & Jo Ann
lender.loan_because: We admire the ambition of these people and want to help. Life has been very good to us and it's exciting to participate in a small way in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: We sell houses and condominiums in Thousand Oaks, CA.

lender.name: Niklas & Line Nielsen
lender.loan_because: Wealth and opportunities are not equally distributed in our world. My family have what we need and hope that our donations can spread happiness and growth to those less fortunate.

lender.name: Jack&Carole
lender.loan_because: A feel good experience.

lender.name: Nimmi

lender.occupational_info: I work for a local distributorship of a large international company, selling their industrial products to local corporations.

lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in this world.

lender.name: Tabitha
lender.loan_because: Microlending is a phenomenally creative, easy, powerful and successful innovation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm happy to be part of a global effort to bring better and healthier food to everyone's table. My work as an editor at the sustainable living magazine, Mother Earth News, is one way to do that. And I believe contributing to microlending programs is another way.

lender.name: Prasanna
lender.loan_because: this is a great cause. I could easily see the big positive impact my small loan could have on somone's life and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work on developing products and technologies that help people stay connected no matter where they are in the world.

lender.name: Stephen & Christine
lender.loan_because: We want to enable others to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We work in the healthcare field.

lender.name: VitaDelight.com
lender.loan_because: LIFE is a Precious Gift~!!! It's a special gift to give people a chance to learn a skill and make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: VitaDelight.com.au is a delightful healthy living online store that prides itself on providing organic natural healthy products to customers at affordable prices. ~Delightful Natural Healthy Living~

lender.name: Pia McGovern, CPDT
lender.loan_because: Itâ€™s so important for a personâ€™s self esteem and respect to be able to be self sufficient and independent. When a person is motivated and wants to make it for him and her self we should support and encourage that! For me it's wonderful to be in a position to be able to help out knowing it's going to potentially make a big difference in someone elseâ€™s life. Being a small business owner myself I know how hard it can be to get a business off the ground and any help and support is very valuable and so appreciated, no matter how small!
lender.occupational_info: I worked with people and their dogs. I teach the dog owner how to best work with their dog and to accomplish desired goals using positive reinforcement and motivational techniques both for the dog and the owner. I offer group obedience classes and also go to peopleâ€™s homes. Many of my clients have dog or people aggressive dogs, which is what I specialize in.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to have a good income, lovely family and home. My children are healthy and have a good education. Everyone deserves those basic things in life.
lender.occupational_info: I look after other peoples money for a living. Those who want to borrow can look after mine for a change!

lender.name: FamilyLobby.com
lender.loan_because: Our goal is to help keep families together and strong. Kiva.org allows us to support families through the entrepreneurs that lead them.
lender.occupational_info: We make it fun and easy to keep every member up to date, pass along family traditions, and keep the important things in mind, no matter how busy our lives become.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: People have helped me and I would like to help others.

lender.name: Leigh Ann
lender.loan_because:
I can.
Thank you Lord for giving so much to me, so that I can help others.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I like to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that my employers computers can talk to each other.

lender.occupational_info: its the fastest growing business in KENYA since people doesnt have time for the bank queing

lender.name: Kathy & Tom

lender.name: Ilse
lender.loan_because: The richness of life is in sharing, not keeping it to yourself.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because:
1) The Kiva concept of promoting entrepreneurship is vastly more effective in terms of long term economic value and development than a simple handout.

lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur/Business Owner

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel so fortunate. My kids and I love reading the stories and knowing that we are helping someone improve their life or realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my three kids at home. I drive them to their activities, help with homework, cook our meals, and take care of our home.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I can help somebody just a little.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I feel an internal need to help this world become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Building community websites.

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: You would also want help from someone if you needed it.
lender.occupational_info: Build and maintain swimming pools.

lender.name: Dr. Lynn
lender.loan_because: I value drive, commitment, and people with an entrepreneurial spirit. I wish for everyone to have a chance to be successful in life, and I take joy in contributing to different organizations and causes throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an advance-practice registered nurse and licensed nursing home administrator. Currently, I own a health care consulting firm in Arizona, located in the United States.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I want to connect with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: As a Kiva Fellow I worked with Kiva's field partners in Sierra Leone to both support and audit their work.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I am one of the fortunate people born in the West, with a good education and every opportunity for a comfortable life. I want to share my wealth so that other people can also have an opportunity to build a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have had to flee from their homes, communities, language and culture to find security in a safe country.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for all the wonderful blessing I have received in my life.
lender.occupational_info: Construction industry specializing in concrete structural formwork.

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: God have blessed me with so many beautiful things in my life, and I want to share my blessings with other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctoral student in linguistics and second language acquisition. While studying, I teach spanish or linguistics introduction classes.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: because I believe that every drop in the universe counts, and if it is positive and for the better, the world will be better!
lender.occupational_info: union between people

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Dinah
lender.loan_because: it is something I can do to help make the world more equitable.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Social Studies to 12-14 year olds.

lender.name: Robert Kilton
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to share a little of my success to help other create their own success
lender.occupational_info: I own a successful business development firm headquartered in Anchorage, Alaska

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I educate students about global solidarity and the relationship between faith, justice, and action.
lender.occupational_info: I teach interdisciplinary humanities, mostly theology. I coordinate the liturgical life (worship) at a Catholic university.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I cannot do all my heart wishes but I can do this. I give with love and hope for our world and your family.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard to provide a home of love for my5 children & 2 grandchildren. I also work with birthing families as a doula.

lender.name: Mary Lou
lender.loan_because: the more ones gives, the larger one's soul expands. Each one touch one
lender.occupational_info: I am a people-person and a problem solver. I worked at the front desk of motels/hotels for many years and met thousands of people. I then was an apartment manager for ten years and got to know my tenants well. I now am retired, get to travel and share, and do my crafts. A good life. I now live in an RV, so I can continue traveling.

lender.name: CATHRYN
lender.loan_because: To extend a helping hand.

lender.name: Olivier S
lender.loan_because: I find it normal that a person who has more helps a person who has less.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: Our world is built upon personal relationships, and its health depends on strengthening connections. I like being able to reach out to individuals and have each one of them reciprocate. Plus, I am grateful for the help I have received in growing my own small business. I am happy to have the chance to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help guide each person's body and mind to heal itself.

lender.name: SouthMiddle(6A Cluster)
lender.loan_because: We would like to make a difference in the lives of entrepenaurs around the world. We raised $115.00 during a raffle and studied 4 nominees to vote on during a school election. We studied each nominee and presented PowerPoint slides on which nominee could benefit the most from our loan. Lastly, we love the connection KIVA allows us to make with our study of world geography!
lender.occupational_info: Gratifying; Eyeopening; Spontaneous; Extremely rewarding; Humorous; Hard work

lender.name: Rajanikanth
lender.loan_because: Started New Business / Project
lender.occupational_info: Good profits

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Alternative to giving Christmas gifts amongst siblings
lender.occupational_info: Aerospace Engineering

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: most people just need a helping hand to stand up.
lender.occupational_info: study, advocate, build

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's mission and want to lend a hand where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies raise money.

lender.name: MAUREEN
lender.loan_because: because I can...
lender.occupational_info: We help people protect their investments by providing insurance for their homes and cars.

lender.name: Roger & Debra
lender.loan_because: we think it's a moral imperative.
lender.occupational_info: I traveled the world as a rock band manager. I got to see first hand how many people need just a little help.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I love seeing how such a small amount of money can impact so many different lives.

lender.name: Sullivan Family
lender.loan_because: WE CARE.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I care. I understand how tough it is to get started and I believe that a hand up is not a hand out. I am a Christian and believe in the power of the free market to free people.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that helps people purchase homes and businesses. It is a Real Estate Sales Company.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in meeting their goals.

lender.name: the Schaeffers
lender.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do. And while we live from paycheck to paycheck ourselves, I know we can spare $25 to make a difference for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the art in a small museum and also hang art shows. My husband writes computer code for a small company.

lender.name: Brother Dave
lender.loan_because: This enpowers people to be independent, encourages enterprise and builds local and global community.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in hospitals, schools and community agencies mostly with alcohol abuse and drug addiction programs. I'm now retired and a homemaker.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Successful businesses help build and support happy families.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer and a mother.

lender.name: Lianne
lender.loan_because: I like to help other women become self-sufficient and increase their ability to care for their families. I also think it is important to balance out the wealth between the west and other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I teach figure skating to children who wish to skate on ice! I also help mom's breastfeed as a lactation consultant in my free time. My children are all homeschooled, so I work with them most days to broaden their worldview and help them become compassionate and grateful individuals.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for all of God's blessings I love to garden and want to help people who farm.
lender.occupational_info: I give haircuts to animals Yes, it's as dumb as it sounds.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: we all can use help at some time.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: people need to support each other achieve more in life.
lender.occupational_info: Educating Americans on the cultures, peoples, economies, and histories of Africa.

lender.name: Evans Family, Alaska
lender.loan_because: All people deserve the opportunity to make their own way. Providing a starting point is essential to this journey. Helping to establish this beginning is why we participate.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have been born into a life where my needs are met and life has been relatively free of struggles. I think we all are bettered when we help people help themselves.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me in various ways all my life, and I feel the obligation and desire to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a freelance basis from my home office, editing books and articles for publication. At present I am working on a translation of a four-volume historical novel about Genghis Khan.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is to start a business since I have done it myself. I like the idea of donating to a charity that is about creating jobs in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help create electronic products used by doctors and nurses in hospitals and by patients at home to deliver their medications.

lender.name: Miss McCormick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the growth of the world as a whole, not just the USA. World development is essential!
